content:
It had always been a small place like all others. The community was a calm, but tight one and people didn't mind helping each other. When the parents went to work, the elders of the village would look after their children. When disaster struck and someone broke a leg, people would help him or her out in their daily work. During the usually sunny weekends, the center of the town was full of people talking and children playing. Even if it did happen to be bad weather, this wouldn't stop them from going over to someone elses place to enjoy the weekend together.

This all changed when on a sunday morning, a man was found in front of the church. He had been shot. Distrust spread through the town, but they decided they wouldn't need outside help now. Like always, they would solve it themselves.


Rules (original by Flameaxe)

General:

1) Have a jolly good time.
2) The mod is always right. Deal with it.
3) If you have a problem with something regarding the game, please PM me, try to keep it out of the thread.
4) Vote in the format Vote: Flinter. Unvoting before voting is cool, but if you forget, don't worry about it.
5) Do not quote role PMs or any other form of communication with me. Failure to comply will result in a modkill.
6) Keep the game in the game. Don't discuss the game outside of the game unless your role says you can. I will find out. I have people. Those people have people.
7) When you are dead, get out of my thread. I rhymed! No "bah" posts.
8) Please do not use small/invisible text, steganography or advanced forms of coding/cryptography. Breadcrumbing is an acceptable form of basic coding.

Deadlines and Activity:

9) Each game day will have deadlines as I see fit. If the day seems to be dragging, I will announce a deadline. Any deadline will be at least seven days from the issuing.
10) If no majority is reached at the deadline, no-lynch will be achieved and lynched like the scumbag he/she/it is!
11) I am would like all of you to be active. If a player goes without a post for 48 hours, they will receive a prod. If no reply IN THREAD is made 48 hours after the prod was given, i will begin searching for a replacement. If you post during the period between searching for a replacement and finding a replacement, you are welcome to stay, but do not expect me to be as lenient after that situation.
12) If you plan on being away from modern civilization for more than 48 hours, let me know via PM.
13) Night phase will have a deadline of no more than 4 days (give or take a few hours if I am not around). No submission, no action. Four days should be plenty of time.
14) This game is a closed setup with a day start.
15) A lynch will require a majority of players voting to be successful. However, a no lynch only requires 50% of the alive players to go through. For example, with 24 people alive, it will take 13 to lynch, but only 12 to no lynch.
16) If any of these rules are broken, and a modkill is performed, the player will automatically lose no matter the outcome.
